tool_description: An API showing all the Information and latest news about Solana
name: Solana Info API
title: Solana Info API

api_list.name: Get news or information form individual source
api_list.description: It will get you the information from the specific source
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://solana-info-api.p.rapidapi.com/info/solanawebsite"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "solana-info-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://solana-info-api.p.rapidapi.com/info/{infoarticleid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "solana-info-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Solana Info and News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back all the info and news related to Solana
